enTranslation.mainBunner.description: Jumla.com is the first Egyptian dropshipping platform that brings together the largest number of suppliers and marketers. It helps you sell online and make profits of more than 6000 pounds per month while you are in your place without having merchandise, store, or direct dealing with shipping companies, not even letting them collect your money.
